For this and bug 79316, I've been using the Heap Status plugins, available at
this update site:
http://dev.eclipse.org/viewcvs/index.cgi/%7Echeckout%7E/platform-ui-home/updates

Install, Disable, Remove, Repeat, choosing Yes to restart whenever prompted.
I see this same exception, and I'm using the same plug-in.

I think that this bug and #79316 were caused by bug #79320 which has been fixed 
in HEAD but not contributed to the rebuild. Since the fix I haven't seen any 
problem.
Please try running with the runtime from HEAD (due to some other fixes you 
probably want to get runtime.compatibility and osgi).

Marking as invalid since the problem was very likely due to bug #79320, and has
not been reproduced since then. Please reopen if it happens with builds later
than I20041130.
